title: Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides rolling out built-in Meet calling with prominent button
content:
As announced at the end of last month, Google Meet is now built into Docs, Sheets, and Slides with a prominent new button that’s rolling out from today.

more…

The post Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides rolling out built-in Meet calling with prominent button appeared first on 9to5Google.
